Join our newsletter.

The Code Writers Workshop is for developers in pursuit of a great life in software.

During this one-day event, we explore the hard bits of building a rewarding career journey and crafting your personal technology strategy. Carefully chosen speakers lead hands-on workshops, lively panels, and compelling keynotes as you engage with top local companies and thought leaders.
